sentences.english: We didn't run too many risks, except for that Erjon Bogdani header.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有承受很多险情，除了博格达尼的头球。

sentences.english: This unit always bears the brunt of any danger.
sentences.chinese: 出现险情时，这支部队总是首当其冲。

sentences.english: A soldier is expected to stand to his post whatever danger threatens him.
sentences.chinese: 不管遇到什么样的险情，士兵都应该站好岗。

sentences.english: Seepage risk is also obvious in dam-break risk except overtopping.
sentences.chinese: 溃坝险情中除漫顶外，渗流险情也较为突出。

sentences.english: Seepage risk is also obvious in dam-break risk except overtopping.
sentences.chinese: 溃坝险情中除漫顶外，渗流险情也较为突出。

sentences.english: Role-play possible situations with the child.
sentences.chinese: 和孩子预演可能出现的险情。

sentences.english: In case danger lurks and a cow needs to make any sudden… moos .
sentences.chinese: 万一周围有险情出现，牛会突然哞哞叫起来。

sentences.english: Fancies screen that danger, to escape the summer Shih-hsiang.
sentences.chinese: 范西屏得知险情，要施襄夏逃脱。

sentences.english: Teach the child how to get out of the house in an emergency like a fire.
sentences.chinese: 教导孩子当遇见诸如火灾等险情时怎样从家里逃生。

definition: to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
(mining) roof fall/to have the roof cave in
water levels during the flood season
firefighting/to extinguish a fire and save life and property/to dive (of goalkeeper in soccer)
